Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1006317,"totalDownVotes":68782,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🌊 SEA 3] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":169064,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔔 UPDATE 15 / BIGGEST UPDATE EVER OUT NOW
🌊 SEA 3: 9 new Fruits, new islands, new weapons, new secrets!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2000
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, Dragon, and Venom!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":638691,"totalDownVotes":31093,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[☄️SPACE!] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":86857,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEXT CODE AT 650k LIKES! ❤️💙

Thanks for playing!","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":412860,"totalDownVotes":67243,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"[BROLY] A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":36685,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗

💼All models, animations, and scripts are created by the game's developers & owners 💼
🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":401341,"totalDownVotes":108178,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🌹 [FREE ELDER TREE!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":61174,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 Updates are every Friday at 12pm PST!

How to play BedWars:

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":280615,"totalDownVotes":14996,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA 🌊UPDATE 4] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":24644,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4459713,"totalDownVotes":377443,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":56051,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":745684,"totalDownVotes":56529,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":20776,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities

⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu ","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":438063,"totalDownVotes":220347,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":22558,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":7352589,"creatorName":"Big Losers Club","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":48049,"totalDownVotes":3271,"universeId":2471701153,"name":"[RELEASE!] Project Star","placeId":6573910231,"playerCount":13153,"imageToken":"T_6573910231_f000","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❓ ABOUT ❓
Project Star is an RPG game made by 10_MinuteAdRevenue and lmaginationBurst for fun. The game is inspired by a popular animated TV show series known as "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure".

P.S: There is a "!join [username]" command in-game! Use it to join your friends!

❗ COMMUNITY ❗
If you would like to receive announcements and/or update progress on the game join our server in the social links below!

⚠️ WARNING ⚠️ 
This game is still new and may contain bugs, lag and/or lag spikes, and other issues. Please keep in mind we are a dev team of 2 people and that issues are to be expected. We will fix any and all issues we run into. Thanks!

💵 PREMIUM PLAYERS 💵
Players who have bought the ROBLOX Premium Membership will get an additional 15% EXP.

👀 CURRENT CONTENT 👀
The game currently contains content from Parts 1, 2, and 3. We will be adding more content from other parts soon.

Need additional help or information? We have a Trello!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":862101,"totalDownVotes":108546,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🔥 [PETS + LAVA!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":18979,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌲 Build your own island

🔥 And more!

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":615795,"totalDownVotes":68243,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『NEW UPDATE』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":13364,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.88』 🏹✨
➢ 4 NEW CODES ( IN UZUKEE'S YOUTUBE CHANNEL )
➢ NEW STAND REWORK
➢ NEW STAND SKINS
➢ NEW COSMETICS
➢ 2X ITEM SPAWN ON WEEKENDS
➢ BALANCES FIXES CHANGES
➢ and much more ingame!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2306937,"totalDownVotes":310118,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":24832,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event!✅
🌊Wave ᒿ: Quests✅
🌊Wave 3: Fair Pier👻Postponed for Halloween👻

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2419390,"totalDownVotes":336875,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":43796,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":439721,"totalDownVotes":41759,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":23562,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Cr Clothing : Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1169822,"totalDownVotes":61383,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"DUNGEONS!🏯 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":12104,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 36q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 19]:
- 💀STORYLINE 2!
- 💪x10 STATS!
- 🏯2 NEW DUNGEONS
- 🎡WHEEL!
- 📆LOGIN REWARDS!
- 📜44 NEW QUESTS!
- 📍SET DIMENSION SPAWN!

- ⚔️3 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 💪5 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- 👿3 NEW BOSSES!
- 💥13 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️4 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 🌟15 NEW SPECIALS!
- 💎5 NEW ARMAMENTS!
- 🪐4 NEW CURSE TECHNIQUES!
- 🐉1 NEW FRUIT!
- 🔥1 NEW PYROKINESIS!
- 👹1 NEW DEMON ART!
- 🌠1 NEW QUIRK!
- 🐛BUG FIXES!
- ⚖️POWER BALANCING!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

BlockZone: @BlockZone_
Director: @NyxunRBX
Head Developers: @RobxSoft, @_Chichine
Scripters: @_DevCrow, @eXo0ne_, @lyzrinn, @Dact_ylioglyph
Builder: @BIack_Smith","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1322996,"totalDownVotes":75294,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14252,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4600395,"totalDownVotes":624001,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":12005,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"We're excited to announce the RETURN of:
 🎉 FIVE DAYS OF VEHICLES! 🎉
- Tuesday: THE CAMPER VAN! Find it at The Tomb!
- Wednesday: THE RAY-9! Find it at the town gas station! 
- Thursday: THE TRAILBLAZER! 
- Friday: THE TORERO!
- Saturday: The CONCEPT Car! Find it near the city basketball court!

Season 5 is ongoing! Get that Banana Car!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":10927001,"creatorName":"SUPER SAVAGE MODE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":58506,"totalDownVotes":4770,"universeId":2621357931,"name":"👑STRONGEST PUNCH SIMULATOR","placeId":6875469709,"playerCount":12944,"imageToken":"T_6875469709_3521","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Are you ready to become the strongest of them all?

GUIDE
Break Through Walls --> Reach World Borders --> Teleport To Higher Worlds --> - Collect Power Ups Hidden Behind The Walls --> Feed Your Mythical Pets And Evolve Them --> Become Stronger --> Do You Desire To Protect Or Destroy, Take Your Sides!

FAQ
- Experiencing lag? Turn on ‘Fast Mode’ in settings
- Punch terrain walls to gain double the amount of power!
- Become stronger to create bigger punch explosions!
- Train in higher worlds to gain more power!
- Higher worlds have denser terrains causing your area of explosion to be reduced!
- Upgrade Punch Multiplier to train faster!
- Damage done to stronger heroes will reflect back upon yourself!
- Choose to attack only good/bad heroes in settings to prevent unwanted reputation losses!
